## Event Information

Event Name:
Type of event: (See below for more information)
Date:
Registration URL:
Website URL:
Location name:
Street: 
Zip/Postal code:
City:
Country: 
Latitude:
Longitude:

### Type of event
It can be any of the following:

* dc - Demo Camp & Stammtisch
* wg - Working Group Events
* ec - EclipseCon
* ed - Eclipse Day & Hackathons
* et - Training Series
* ee - Other interesting Events
* ve - Virtual Events
